questions.question: The one-pass optimized Two Sum approach typically uses:
questions.explanation: A hash map stores seen values for O(1)-average lookups.

questions.question: At each number x, what do you check first?
questions.explanation: You need the complement value target - x.

questions.question: Typical time complexity for hash-map solution:
questions.explanation: Single pass plus constant-average map operations gives O(n).

questions.question: Typical extra space complexity is:
questions.explanation: Map can store up to n seen values.
